short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaaS Apps to Make Business Processes Easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The IntelligenceBank Universal Connector lets you quickly and easily insert your IntelligenceBank files into any third-party web application, either by drag & drop upload (if supported by the third-party application) or by referencing a direct public link to the original asset (leveraging distribution via CDN, remote invalidation and usage tracking). You can learn more about IntelligenceBank and how the Universal Connector for IntelligenceBank can help you streamline your integration workflows at www.intelligencebank.com
